title: Stay in Madrid
text: This hotel was wonderful. The staff was great. They were super friendly and helpful. The room we stayed in was amazing. It had bunk beds, a huge master room, stove, and beautiful bathroom. It is in a great location next to a massive park. The little lounge/cafe had any quick snack or coffe 24/7. All in all I had a supurb stay at Petit Palace.
place: Petit Palace Savoy Alfonso XII Plus

title: Dinner in Madrid
text: This small family owned and run cafe was delicious. They are opened on sundays which was a life savor. They have a wonderful steak with potatoes. The calamarie with a sweet potatoe souce had a very unique taste. It almost had a smoked taste to it. They have very nice and calming music. The tarta de Santiago(Spanish almound cake) is what they are known for. It was very delicious.

title: Acroplis
text: The Acroplis is Proboly one of Athens biggest and best attractions. It has many imformative signs every where. There is so much history to learn with all the old buildings, statues, tombs, pottery, and more. The small walk to the top of the Acropolis is full of intresting buildings such as two amphitheaters and multiple monuments. The Parthenon is a wonderful sight to see. You can see all of Athens from the top of the Acropolis.

title: Athens resturaunt
text: This hidden gem in Athens was a lovely little spot to sit and eat for lunch. The service was fantastic. 2 little old ladies cooked up an amazing meal. The stuffed cabbage was supurb with its warm, light, and filling stuffed insides. This place is far enough from all the tourist, but close enough to every thing that it is not a bad walk.

title: Amazing art
text: This was museum was incredible. It was a very clean, big, and well managed art museum. The art there was fantastic. If you want to go to the Prada museum, buy the tickets in advance due to the dact the line was VERY long.

title: Greta place to get quick tapas.
text: This back alley tapas bar is a great place get tapas. The place has an amazing inside with all the tapas on the bar. The service was good. Great place to sit and relax.

title: Meet meat
text: This place has a very good lamb chop dish. The service was great and very friendly. Their is a lot of room to sit and dine. The corn bread is a very good appatizier.
